results.p: Jul 27, 2024 — A day trader is an investor who buys, sells and trades stocks in transactions that take place within a single day.

results.t: Day Trading Basics: What You Need To Know
results.p: Apr 16, 2024 — Day trading is a short-term investment strategy. The goal is to exit all your trades by the end of the day, holding no securities overnight.

results.t: Day Trader - Definitions, Strategies and Tips
results.p: A day trader is an individual who opens and closes all of his or her trades before the end of the trading day; no open positions are maintained overnight.
